name: Bumpy (test)
description:
Get to the white square without hitting the obstacles.

Hitting more than 4 obstacles will cause your character to explode.

There are currently three levels, with 3 characters you have to take to safety :

Bumpy 

Tanky 

Rovey

Inspired by the Obstacle Course tutorial game found on the Udemy course : https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse2/learn/lecture/24879862#notes

(accessed August 2021)
